question:
Consider the following statements about the “Scheme for Capacity Building in Textile Sector (SCBTS)”:
  1. It covers the entire value chain of the textile sector including Spinning & Weaving in organized Sector
  2. The scheme will have National Skill Qualification Framework (NSQF) compliant training courses
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect.</u> The scheme covering the entire value chain of the textile sector excluding Spinning & Weaving in organized Sector. <u>Second statement is correct. </u>This scheme will have National Skill Qualification Framework (NSQF) compliant training courses with funding norms as per the Common Norms notified by Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship (MSDE). Recently, the Union Cabinet approved the \"Scheme for Capacity Building in Textile Sector (SCBTS)\" from 2017-18 to 2019-20 with an outlay of Rs. 1300 crore. The major objective of the scheme is to provide demand driven, placement oriented skilling programme to individuals to incentivize job creating opportunities for the industry.
